item.description:
comments about this class from members of the North Shore Womens Meetup-

"Had a great time. Connie was very inspring."_Regina

"Loved it"._ DonnaÂ 

This is a class for people who think they can't draw. There are techniques we will use which have been developed to help us connect to the right side of our brains.*
The right side is our creative side, the left is our logical, analytical side. To be able to draw realistically involves turning off the left & tapping into our right brain.
With the help of a glass of pinot & artist Connie Festo Lafond, we will learn a couple of ways to keep the left side out of our artistic efforts & stay on the right side, in this fun class.

* "Drawing on the Right Side of The Brain" by Betty Edwards

7-9pm Thursday November 1st
$35 for everything including wine

members who wish to attend must register in advance at
http://kidcassoart.com/courses/adultcourses
item.name: Sketch Class - Pinot with Pablo - for people who think they can't draw....
